original_title: 嫁の猟奇的な浮気癖が酷い、酷すぎる 星宮一花 （ブルーレイディスク）
overview: Ichika has a good relationship with her husband but he is too busy at work, and so, she resorts to cheating.  Every day with a new partner, because she is addicted to sex, and denim jeans.
title: My Bride’s Bizarre Infidelity Is Terrible, Just Too Terrible – Ichika Hoshimiya
